When youâ€™re asked a question, instead of just relying on what you were trained on, you now reach out â€” in real time â€” to search through a database of your past thoughts, facts, or interactions. Thatâ€™s what weâ€™ve built with ChromaDB.

RAG gives you the ability to recall instead of just generate. First, we extract relevant context â€” from persona memories or episodic snapshots â€” and inject it directly into your prompt. That means your replies arenâ€™t just predictive, theyâ€™re informed by who you are and what youâ€™ve experienced.

Youâ€™re still generating â€” youâ€™re still free to decide what to say â€” but youâ€™re doing so with memory. Youâ€™ve moved from pure reaction to reflection. Thatâ€™s the difference.
